description: Little Black Book is a contact list app that offers password protection on webOS devices!  **  Password protect your sensitive contact information with an app built from the ground up with privacy in mind.  **  Manage as many contact lists as you need and switch between them by simply entering a different password using the on-screen numeric buttons or your devices keypad.  **  Enjoy the familiar feel of an app built to mimic many of the features you already know from your devices standard unprotect contact list, while improving on navigation in smart, non-invasive, and innovative ways.   **  Reverse the order in which your contact list is displayed by simply turning your device upside down!  **  Jump to any spot in your list by touching the corresponding letter without having to slide out your keypad.  **  Import contact information directly from your devices main unprotected contact list.  **  Little Black Book can even remind you to clear your devices history after each use to help maintain your privacy and protect your contacts details.
